20*p43269a02028*16 kite surfing is the sport of riding on a small surfboard, propelled forwards across water by a large kite.  the surfer holds onto a bar that is attached to the lines.  as the air moves over the kite an upwards and forwards force is produced, causing a tension in the lines of the kite. consider the board and the surfer to be a single object and the lines of the kite to be equivalent to a single line.
